name: Drop Down Buttons for iOS
tagline: Drop down buttons with support for Objective-C and Swift
body:
### Drop Down Buttons
My own custom drop down buttons that display content from a supplied array. Originally created using Objective-C, I decided to remake them using swift. In my supplied sample project you can test out the buttons for your self. In the sample project the buttons are implemented using both Objective-C and Swift. The functionality is identical for both languages.

### Video Demonstration
[Drop Down Objective-C Video](http://vid1039.photobucket.com/albums/a479/aministellae/ObjC_but_recording720_zpsvxsdcu96.mp4)

### Wiki
Take a look at the [wiki](https://github.com/aj-bartocci/DropDownButtons/wiki) for [class reference](https://github.com/aj-bartocci/DropDownButtons/wiki/Class-Reference), [example usage](https://github.com/aj-bartocci/DropDownButtons/wiki/Example-Usage), and for more information about how to implement the drop down buttons.

### Personal App Website
Check out some of my apps on [my website](http://www.aministellae.com)
